description: Try our easy to follow Hamburger With The Works recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Hamburger With The Works Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Line 1 baking tray with baking paper and a second tray with paper towel.
Combine mince, onion, breadcrumbs, parsley and 1/2 cup relish in a bowl. Season. Form mixture into 4 patties.

Heat oil in a non-stick frying pan over medium heat. Add patties and cook for 3 minutes on each side or until golden. Transfer to tray with baking paper. Top with cheese. Bake for 10 minutes or until cooked through.

Meanwhile, cook pineapple in frying pan for 2 minutes on each side or until golden. Transfer to second tray. Cook bacon for 6 minutes or until golden and crisp. Transfer to tray with pineapple. Fry eggs for 2-3 minutes. Cover to keep warm.
Spread roll bases with mayonnaise. Top with salad, tomato, beetroot, pattie, pineapple, egg and bacon. Season with cracked pepper. Serve with crisps.
